imagePullSecrets.description: Global Docker registry secret names as an array

defaultStorageClass.description: Global default StorageClass for Persistent Volume(s)

adaptSecurityContext.description: Adapt the securityContext sections of the deployment to make them compatible with Openshift restricted-v2 SCC: remove runAsUser, runAsGroup and fsGroup and let the platform use their allowed default IDs. Possible values: auto (apply if the detected running cluster is Openshift), force (perform the adaptation always), disabled (do not perform adaptation)

commonLabels.description: Labels to add to all deployed objects

commonAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to all deployed objects

extraDeploy.description: Array of extra objects to deploy with the release

useHostnames.description: Use hostnames internally when announcing replication. If false, the hostname will be resolved to an IP address

nameResolutionThreshold.description: Failure threshold for internal hostnames resolution

nameResolutionTimeout.description: Timeout seconds between probes for internal hostnames resolution

enabled.description: Enable diagnostic mode (all probes will be disabled and the command will be overridden)

command.description: Command to override all containers in the deployment

args.description: Args to override all containers in the deployment

digest.description: Redis® image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

enabled.description: Enable password authentication

sentinel.description: Enable password authentication on sentinels too

existingSecret.description: The name of an existing secret with Redis® credentials

existingSecretPasswordKey.description: Password key to be retrieved from existing secret

usePasswordFiles.description: Mount credentials as files instead of using an environment variable

commonConfiguration.description: Common configuration to be added into the ConfigMap

existingConfigmap.description: The name of an existing ConfigMap with your custom configuration for Redis® nodes

count.description: Number of Redis® master instances to deploy (experimental, requires additional configuration)

revisionHistoryLimit.description: The number of old history to retain to allow rollback

disableCommands.description: Array with Redis® commands to disable on master nodes

command.description: Override default container command (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args (useful when using custom images)

enableServiceLinks.description: Whether information about services should be injected into pod's environment variable

preExecCmds.description: Additional commands to run prior to starting Redis® master

extraFlags.description: Array with additional command line flags for Redis® master

extraEnvVars.description: Array with extra environment variables to add to Redis® master nodes

redis.description: Container port to open on Redis® master nodes

Enable livenessProbe on Redis® master nodes
Enable readinessProbe on Redis® master nodes

customStartupProbe.description: Custom startupProbe that overrides the default one

customReadinessProbe.description: Custom readinessProbe that overrides the default one

resourcesPreset.description: Set container resources according to one common preset (allowed values: none, nano, micro, small, medium, large, xlarge, 2xlarge). This is ignored if master.resources is set (master.resources is recommended for production).

resources.description: Set container requests and limits for different resources like CPU or memory (essential for production workloads)

enabled.description: Enabled Redis® master pods' Security Context

sysctls.description: Set kernel settings using the sysctl interface

fsGroup.description: Set Redis® master pod's Security Context fsGroup

runAsUser.description: Set Redis® master containers' Security Context runAsUser

runAsGroup.description: Set Redis® master containers' Security Context runAsGroup

runAsNonRoot.description: Set Redis® master containers' Security Context runAsNonRoot

allowPrivilegeEscalation.description: Is it possible to escalate Redis® pod(s) privileges

readOnlyRootFilesystem.description: Set container's Security Context read-only root filesystem

type.description: Set Redis® master containers' Security Context seccompProfile

drop.description: Set Redis® master containers' Security Context capabilities to drop

kind.description: Use either Deployment, StatefulSet (default) or DaemonSet

schedulerName.description: Alternate scheduler for Redis® master pods

minReadySeconds.description: How many seconds a pod needs to be ready before killing the next, during update

automountServiceAccountToken.description: Mount Service Account token in pod

podLabels.description: Extra labels for Redis® master pods

shareProcessNamespace.description: Share a single process namespace between all of the containers in Redis® master pods

podAffinityPreset.description: Pod affinity preset. Ignored if `master.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: Pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `master.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

type.description: Node affinity preset type. Ignored if `master.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: Node label key to match. Ignored if `master.affinity` is set

values.description: Node label values to match. Ignored if `master.affinity` is set
